author: title
Latour, Bruno: On actor-network theory. A few clarifications plus more than a few complications

author: tag

author: quote
Latour, Bruno: A technical network in the engineer's sense is only one of the possible final and stabilized state of an actor-network. An actor-network may lack all the chracteristics of a technical netowrk - it may be local, it may have no compulsory paths, no stategically positioned nodes.
